title: Bug 10571WizardPage shows plugins not found when plugins exist
description: C:\Temp4)Next : the wizard page appears showing no plugins found5)Back6)Select 'choose from plugins in the runtime platform'7)NextThe wizard page will appear showing no plugins found. This is incorrect. JRT
OB: Bug 10571WizardPage shows plugins not found when plugins exist If Ichoose 'choose from plugins in the runtime platform' right off the bat plugins will be found.20020226.
SR: 1)Fileimport...External Plugins and Fragments2)Next3)Select 'import plugins from the file system' and choose some locationex. If Ichoose 'choose from plugins in the runtime platform' right off the bat plugins will be found.20020226.
